```{r}
source("R/function.R")
possible_cars = data.frame(name = c("A", "B", "C", "D"),
                           cylinders = c(2, 4, 6, 8),
                           horsepower = c(50, 200, 400, 1000),
                           weight = c(500, 4000, 5000, 6000))
speed_base = 80

possible_cars$power = autopower(V = speed_base, A = possible_cars$area, 
                                m = possible_cars$mass)

head(possible_cars)
```
